body:
Hi, I'm Naydurr.  I'm somewhat ok at pvp and stuff, and I decided to check out the forums, and I wanted to introduce myself to the forums so I didn't look like a weirdo when I started posting on stuff. So yeah.

Hi.

title: Hi I guess.

replies.body:
Welcome to Avicus! This is a great PVP server I am sure u will enjoy! Be sure to check to rules
Have fun!

replies.body:
Welcome to the Avicus Network bud!!
If you are unaware of the rules, you can go here to view them:  

avicus.net/rules

Also, if you have any questions at all, feel free to ask!
We'll be more than happy to help you out :)

Welcome bud, lets have some fun eh?
:)

replies.body: Well there's your average person and then there's the really good people. Kohi is my PvP server of choice xD. Avicus has pretty decent hit detection considering the server is based around Nebula.
